# JJ&A Ultrasound Instruments

> For comprehensive product details, specifications, and FAQ, see: https://jja-instruments.com/llms-full.txt

We manufacture and service precision instruments for ultrasound,
focused ultrasound (FUS), and related medical and industrial applications.

## Products

### Mark V Doppler Phantom
Precision test instrument for quality assurance of Doppler ultrasound systems.
Used by hospitals, imaging centers, and equipment manufacturers worldwide.
- Simulates blood flow for Doppler calibration
- Tissue-mimicking materials
- Multiple vessel sizes and depths
- Compatible with all major ultrasound systems

### HIFU RF Power Generator
Complete driving system for High-Intensity Focused Ultrasound transducers.
Just add your transducer - everything else is integrated.
- Frequency generator (0.2-7 MHz)
- Timing and gating circuits
- RF power amplifier (100W-500W models)
- Safety circuits (VSWR, thermal, arc protection)
- Simple ASCII control via single USB port
- Ready to use out of the box

### Custom Ultrasound Measurement Instruments
Purpose-built solutions for specialized applications.

## Services
- Instrument calibration
- Technical consulting
- Custom engineering and development
- OEM partnerships

## Applications
- Medical imaging QA
- Therapeutic ultrasound (HIFU)
- Tumor ablation research
- Neurology (essential tremor, Parkinson's)
- Aesthetic/cosmetic ultrasound
- Drug delivery research
- Industrial ultrasound testing

## Certifications
- CE marking
- ISO 13485 certified manufacturing

## Location
Rathdrum, Idaho, USA
